column5: One of my favorite lures for most stream species including brook and rainbow trout was "Kwikfish" in small k5 size but I can't find them anymore. I have found large rattling version only. Similar to a "flatfish" but single treble hook. Anyone know if they are still available?

ya still available but you can't find them at the big box stores like Crappy Tire and Wallyworld, gotta go to your local tackle shops to get them...the gold ones worked killer this past winter for big steelies on the lower Niagara out of the boat drifting on a 3 way
A lot of "Kwikfish" are available at Bass Pro. Second row to the left of the reel counter near the main aisle.
Thanks guys. Time for another visit to BPS.
